articles.title: America's vaccination divide didn't happen by accident - NBC News
articles.description: The surge of Covid-19 cases in red states with low vaccination rates isn't happening by accident.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Weve told you how red states with the nations lowest vaccination rates are seeing many of the greatest increases in new coronavirus cases and hospitalizations.
